mappings.name: ner-tag
mappings.description: fields used as target for the named entity recognition task

text/plain.example:

  "name": "Test Dataset",
  "description": "a simple test",
  "mappings": [
    {
      "name": "ner-tag",
      "description": "fields used as target for the named entity recognition task",

        "NAMED_ENTITY_RECOGNITION"

parameters.name: datasetId
parameters.description: Id of the dataset which should be deleted.

kFolds.name: kFolds
kFolds.description:
Number of combinations unique partitioning into train/validation sets accross the dataset, often used in cross-validation.
Mutually exclusive with validationSplit parameter.

validationSplit.name: validationSplit
validationSplit.description:
Ratio of training data reserved for validating the model during training.
Mutually exclusive with kFolds parameter.

testSplit.name: testSplit
testSplit.description:
Ratio of training data reserved for testing the model after training. 
Can only be set, if the dataset has no predefined test data, i.e. testDocuments is an empty list.

seed.name: seed
seed.description:
Seed used in random operations, e.g. shuffling the dataset. 
Set to get the same splits during multiple calls to the service.

datasetId.name: datasetId
datasetId.description: Id of the dataset to retrieve.
